verses.text: This \w is|strong="H5612"\w* \w the|strong="H5612"\w* \w burden|strong="H4853"\w* against \w Nineveh|strong="H5210"\w*, \w the|strong="H5612"\w* \w book|strong="H5612"\w* \w of|strong="H5612"\w* \w the|strong="H5612"\w* \w vision|strong="H2377"\w* \w of|strong="H5612"\w* \w Nahum|strong="H5151"\w* \w the|strong="H5612"\w* Elkoshite:

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w jealous|strong="H7072"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w avenging|strong="H5358"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*; \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w avenging|strong="H5358"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* full \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w wrath|strong="H2534"\w*. \w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w takes|strong="H5358"\w* \w vengeance|strong="H5358"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w His|strong="H3068"\w* \w foes|strong="H6862"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w reserves|strong="H5201"\w* \w wrath|strong="H2534"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w His|strong="H3068"\w* \w enemies|strong="H6862"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* slow \w to|strong="H3068"\w* anger \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w power|strong="H3581"\w*; \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w means|strong="H5352"\w* \w leave|strong="H5352"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* guilty \w unpunished|strong="H5352"\w*. \w His|strong="H3068"\w* \w path|strong="H1870"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w whirlwind|strong="H5492"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w storm|strong="H5492"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w clouds|strong="H6051"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* dust beneath \w His|strong="H3068"\w* \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3605"\w* \w rebukes|strong="H1605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w and|strong="H3220"\w* \w dries|strong="H3001"\w* \w it|strong="H3001"\w* \w up|strong="H3001"\w*; \w He|strong="H3605"\w* \w makes|strong="H3001"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w rivers|strong="H5104"\w* \w run|strong="H3001"\w* \w dry|strong="H3001"\w*. \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w* \w and|strong="H3220"\w* \w Carmel|strong="H3760"\w* \w wither|strong="H3001"\w*, \w and|strong="H3220"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w flower|strong="H6525"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w* wilts.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* \w quake|strong="H7493"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Him|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w hills|strong="H1389"\w* \w melt|strong="H4127"\w* \w away|strong="H5375"\w*; \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth trembles \w at|strong="H3427"\w* \w His|strong="H3605"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w*—\w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w world|strong="H8398"\w* \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* dwellers.

\w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w can|strong="H4310"\w* \w withstand|strong="H5975"\w* \w His|strong="H6440"\w* \w indignation|strong="H2195"\w*? \w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w can|strong="H4310"\w* \w endure|strong="H5975"\w* \w His|strong="H6440"\w* \w burning|strong="H2740"\w* \w anger|strong="H2534"\w*? \w His|strong="H6440"\w* \w wrath|strong="H2534"\w* \w is|strong="H4310"\w* \w poured|strong="H5413"\w* \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w like|strong="H2534"\w* fire; even \w rocks|strong="H6697"\w* \w are|strong="H4310"\w* shattered \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Him|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w stronghold|strong="H4581"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w distress|strong="H6869"\w*; \w He|strong="H3117"\w* cares \w for|strong="H3068"\w* those \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w trust|strong="H2620"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w Him|strong="H3045"\w*.

\w But|strong="H7291"\w* \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w an|strong="H6213"\w* overwhelming \w flood|strong="H7858"\w* \w He|strong="H6213"\w* \w will|strong="H2822"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w an|strong="H6213"\w* \w end|strong="H3617"\w* \w of|strong="H4725"\w* Nineveh \w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w pursue|strong="H7291"\w* \w His|strong="H6213"\w* enemies \w into|strong="H6213"\w* \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w*.

\w Whatever|strong="H4100"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w plot|strong="H2803"\w* \w against|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w bring|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w an|strong="H6213"\w* \w end|strong="H3617"\w*. \w Affliction|strong="H6869"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w rise|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* second \w time|strong="H6471"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5704"\w* \w be|strong="H3588"\w* \w entangled|strong="H5440"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w thorns|strong="H5518"\w* \w and|strong="H5704"\w* consumed \w like|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w drink|strong="H5435"\w* \w of|strong="H4390"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w drunkard|strong="H5433"\w*—\w like|strong="H5704"\w* \w stubble|strong="H7179"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3588"\w* \w fully|strong="H4390"\w* \w dry|strong="H3002"\w*.

\w From|strong="H4480"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* Nineveh, \w comes|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* plotter \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w counselor|strong="H3289"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w wickedness|strong="H7451"\w*.

\w This|strong="H3651"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: “Though \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* allied \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w numerous|strong="H7227"\w*, \w yet|strong="H5750"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w cut|strong="H1494"\w* \w down|strong="H1494"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* \w away|strong="H5674"\w*. Though \w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w afflicted|strong="H6031"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* Judah, \w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w afflict|strong="H6031"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w longer|strong="H5750"\w*.

\w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* will \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w break|strong="H7665"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w yoke|strong="H4132"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* neck \w and|strong="H7665"\w* \w tear|strong="H5423"\w* \w away|strong="H5423"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w shackles|strong="H4147"\w*.”

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w issued|strong="H6680"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w command|strong="H6680"\w* \w concerning|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* Nineveh: “\w There|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* descendants \w to|strong="H3068"\w* carry \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*. \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w off|strong="H3772"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w carved|strong="H6459"\w* \w image|strong="H6459"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w cast|strong="H3068"\w* \w idol|strong="H6459"\w* \w from|strong="H3772"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* gods; \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w prepare|strong="H7760"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w grave|strong="H6913"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w contemptible|strong="H7043"\w*.”

Look to the mountains—the feet of one who brings good news, who proclaims peace! Celebrate your feasts, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* Judah; fulfill your vows. For the wicked will never again march through you; they will be utterly cut off.
